alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:10AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Thomas, Rawlins, northwestern Sheridan and southwestern Decatur Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 109 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Herndon to 12 miles southeast of McDonald. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colby. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 52 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
